scripts.push-to-public: npm run cp-commit-rest; npm run cp-commit-gql
scripts.cp-rest: cd ../xc_struct_public; git pull; rm -rf ./*;rsync -ar --exclude="node_modules"  ../xc-examples/packages/dvdrental-rest/ ./ && mv ./config.xc.json ./eg.config.xc.json && rm -rf ./server/routers/primary ./server/services/primary ./server/tool/apis/swagger/primary ./server/tool/apis/swagger/swagger-autogenerated.json && find ./server/models/primary/ ! -name 'users.*.js' -type f -exec rm -f {} +
scripts.cp-gql: cd ../xc_struct_public_gql; git pull; rm -rf ./*;rsync -ar  --exclude="node_modules"  ../xc-examples/packages/dvdrental-gql/ ./ && mv ./config.xc.json ./eg.config.xc.json && rm -rf ./server/resolvers/primary ./server/services/primary && find ./server/models/primary/ ! -name 'users.*.js' -type f -exec rm -f {} + && find ./server/graphql/primary/schema ! -name 'users.*.js' ! -name 'default.schema.js' ! -name 'auth.schema.js' -type f -exec rm -f {} + && find ./server/graphql/primary/types ! -name 'users.*.js' -type f -exec rm -f {} +
scripts.commit-rest: cd ../xc_struct_public ; git add -A . ; git commit -am "test"; git push
scripts.commit-gql: cd ../xc_struct_public_gql ; git add -A . ; git commit -am "test"; git push
scripts.cp-commit-rest: npm run cp-rest && npm run commit-rest
scripts.cp-commit-gql: npm run cp-gql && npm run commit-gql
